Q: What errors other return code indicate? return 1? return 100? is there a standard? A:

Returning a double would also give you all the double comparison problems. IEEE754, you know?

Q: I'm trying to require a query in my request only if another query is sent A:

Yes you can do that

'sortBy' => 'othervalidation|required_with:sortOrder',
                'sortOrder'=>'othervalidation|required_with:sortBy',

Q: Mysql update using an inner never ends infinite loop, but select works A:

Try this query. Because of the CONCAT in yours, he has to process all entries with CONCAT for every JOIN and can then compare them. Also set a combining INDEX to first_name + lastname

UPDATE 
    sale 
INNER JOIN 
    employee ON employee.first_name = SUBSTRING_INDEX(sale.salesperson, ' ', 1)
             AND employee.last_name = SUBSTRING_INDEX(sale.salesperson, ' ', -1)
SET 
    salesperson_employee_id = employee.employee_id;
